name: Sky Heist
description:
You are a robber that robs planes and their cargo midair.

Get points by putting your cursor over  green crates. 

Don't go near the red squares, thats debris from the plane!

go to the purple checkpoints to save your progress!

go to the red portal to go to the ocean world.

hover over  the orange blimps to gain altitude.

right click to dive by 1000.

the purple number is your score, the orange is your oxygen, and lastly tth eblue is your altitude,

and lastly have fun.

ps. This game is in development! I just want some feedback.
